title: Episode 187: The Gates of Hell
description:
The discovery city, the capital of Ohio. C-bus is the gateway to many things - Industry, museums, and a world-class education at The Ohio State University. But lurking just moments away from the home of the Buckeyes is a doorway to something more sinister. Is this location just a hangout for skaters and teens or is it a portal to the underworld?

Recorded live at Funny Bone in Columbus, Ohio

Click here for information about our tour and to purchase tickets!
